H0.text: The Sun is very pretty is a statement of fact.

H1.text: The Sun is fun to study is a statement of fact that answers the question “Which is a statement of fact?”

H2.text: The Sun is larger than Earth.

H3.text: The Sun is more interesting than the Moon is a statement of fact according to the question “Which is a statement of fact?”

A4.text: Its large mass (332,900 Earth masses), which comprises 99.86% of all the mass in the Solar System
